title: Game freezes + 10-15 sec to get Scoreboard after a game
body:
Well, i've been suffering about this two problems for the past few days, once in a while (every 5-10 games) my game freezes and the task manager says "LoL (Not responding)", Someone had the same problem and fixed it ? The second problem is; After every single game, it takes for the score board around 20-30 sec to pop up.

Thanks for your time!

replies.body:
That first issue with LoL crashing completely might be a sign that some of the game files have been corrupted somehow. I'd suggest running a repair through the client options to make sure everything is still intact. You should be able to find that repair button by clicking on the gear icon in the upper right of the client.

It definitely shouldn't take that long for the post game lobby to load either. While you're in the client options, look for a checkbox called **close client during game**. Make sure that is NOT checked, and you should see the post game quicker!
I will try to repair the files, and that option was checked so, now i changed and it's going fine! Thanks a lot !

Huzzah for post game lobbies! Let me know if that repair works as well, and if not I can do a little more digging for you ^_^
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
